Document.TEXT: Iris Recognition Market Growing at 21.45% CAGR Driven by Iris Scanners in Smartphones to 2020 PUNE, India February 10, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- According to 2016 iris recognition market report, combined with facial and fingerprint identification iris recognition is more widely accepted for border control. Some multimodal biometrics are available with both fingerprint and iris recognition technology in a single device, which allows the user to avoid purchasing two individual biometrics devices. Complete report on iris recognition market spread across 47 pages, analyzing 5 major companies and providing 11 data exhibits is now available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/global-iris-recognition-market-2016-2020-market-report.html The analysts forecast global iris recognition market to grow at a CAGR of 21.45% during the period 2016-2020. One of the primary drivers of the market is the integration of iris scanners in smartphones. A number of smartphone vendors such as Samsung and LG are planning to integrate iris scanners in their smartphones to enhance the security features of the devices. The high cost of iris recognition systems is a challenge to the market growth. Fingerprint recognition systems and facial recognition systems are cost-effective when compared to iris recognition systems. This is affecting the demand for iris recognition system. The government sector dominated the market during 2015 with a market share of over 50%, which was followed by the transportation sector and healthcare sectors. There is high growth expected in the healthcare sector and the government sector as these sectors require advanced security for critical data protection. The market is expected to witness a significant growth in APAC and Latin America during the forecast period, with the increasing number of vendors in this region, which is increasing the awareness about the advantages of iris recognition systems. The global iris recognition market is highly fragmented because of the presence of numerous small and large vendors. The providers in the market compete on the basis of price, quality, innovation, service, reputation, distribution, and promotion. The high vendor competition has led to an increased number of mergers and acquisitions in the iris recognition market. The key vendors analyzed in iris recognition market report are: 3M Cogent, BioEnable, Crossmatch Technologies, Iris ID, and IRITECH. Other prominent vendors in the market include 4G Identity Solutions, Aditech, BI Technologies, Biomatiques Identification Solution, Easy Clocking, EyeLock, IrisGuard, M2SYS Technology, Smart Sensors, and SRI International. Further, the iris recognition market report states that the high cost of iris recognition systems is a challenge to the market growth. Another related report on biometric market titled Global Law Enforcement Biometrics Market 2015-2019 forecasts global law enforcement biometrics market to grow at a CAGR of 13.35% over the period 2014-2019. The law enforcement sector gradually replaced Bertillon's anthropometric system of criminal identification, which includes physical measurements of body parts, especially components of the head and face of an individual, with biometric technologies. Fingerprint identification, facial recognition, iris recognition, and DNA analysis biometric technologies are widely accepted by the law enforcement sector.
